name: Bartholomew  Advisors SCS
goal: Bartholomew Advisors provides senior level EU public affairs consultancy services for the private sector in the areas of internet, telecommunications, new and traditional media. Focus is on the EU Council of Ministers and the European Commission.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Information Society, Internal Market, Taxation
euInitiatives: Digital Single Market proposals, Telecoms, Copyright, Cybersecurity,  AVMSD, Data Protection
